convexhull.algorithms

Interface Algorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AklToussaintHeuristic, GiftWrapping, GrahamScan, QuickHull

    public interface Algorithm
    Interface for all algorithms and Akl-Toussaint heuristics.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LinkedList useAlgorithm(LinkedList points)
      Gets a set of points, processes them and returns the result set.

    • Method Detail

      • useAlgorithm

        LinkedList useAlgorithm(LinkedList points)
        Gets a set of points, processes them and returns the result set.
        Parameters:
        points - set of points to run algorithm on
        Returns:
        result set of points after algorithm has handled the input set
